sourcesContent:
import React,{useState} from "react"; import "./booking.css"; import { Form, FormGroup, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Button } from "reactstrap"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; const Booking = ({ tour, avgRating }) => { const { price, reviews } = tour; const [credentials, setCredentials ]= useState({ userId : '01', userEmail:'example@gmail.com', fullName:' ', phone:'', guestSize:1, bookAt:'' }) const handleChange = e => { setCredentials(prev=>({...prev,[e.target.id]:e.target.value})) } const serviceFee = 10 const totalAmount = Number(price) *Number(credentials.guestSize)+Number(serviceFee) //send data to server const handerClick = e =>{ e.preventDefault(); console.log(credentials); } return (

${price}/ per person

{avgRating === 0 ? 'Chưa có đánh giá nào':avgRating}({reviews?.length})
Information
{/* booking bottom */}
${price} 1 Người
${price}
Service charge
{serviceFee}
ToTal
{totalAmount}
); }; export default Booking;
